description: Some things change, some things remain much the same. With the fourth edition of this renowned classic updates us on the outdoor regulations and health statistics, as well as essential equipment to do your #2. Having sold more than 3 million copies in 8 languages, How To Shit In The Woods is the go-to guide for anyone looking to hone their backcountry elimination skills or help teach others to deal with their shit.
name: How To Shit In The Woods 4th Ed
